headline: Asia-Pacific markets mostly fall as Trump rattles defense firms and oil prices slide
summary: Overnight, the S&P 500 and the Down Jones Industrial Average snapped a three-day winning streak.

headline: BlueScope Rejects Steel Dynamics, SGH Takeover Bid
summary: BlueScope argued that the $8.8 billion takeover bid didn’t reflect the value expected to be realized through current initiatives, growth investments and land monetization.

raw.headline: BlueScope Rejects Steel Dynamics, SGH Takeover Bid

headline: BlueScope Steel rejects $8.8B takeover bid from Steel Dynamics, SGH
summary: This is the fourth attempt from the U.S. metals recycler and producer to acquire the Australia-based firm's North America businesses since late 2024.

raw.headline: BlueScope Steel rejects $8.8B takeover bid from Steel Dynamics, SGH
raw.summary: This is the fourth attempt from the U.S. metals recycler and producer to acquire the Australia-based firm's North America businesses since late 2024.

headline: Is It Time To Reassess Steel Dynamics (STLD) After A 3.5x Five Year Return?
summary: If you are wondering whether Steel Dynamics at around US$172.74 is still offering value or starting to look stretched, you are not alone. The stock has returned 1.0% over the last week and 4.6% over the last month, with a 1.9% decline year to date set against a 46.3% gain over the past year and a 69.0% return over three years. These moves sit alongside a very large 5 year return of roughly 3.5x. This keeps Steel Dynamics on the radar of many investors and that kind of long term performance...
